Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Boil the pasta and cook the chicken.', '2. Mix the cooked pasta and chicken together.', '3. Put
 the chicken pasta in a plate.']

behavior boil_pasta(pasta:item, pot:item):
    body:
        assert is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        assert is_pot(pot)
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        achieve has_water(pot)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Ensure the pot with pasta and water is on the stove
        achieve on(pot, stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)

behavior cook_chicken(chicken:item, fryingpan:item):
    body:
        assert is_food_chicken(chicken)
        assert is_fryingpan(fryingpan)
        achieve inside(chicken, fryingpan)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Ensure the frying pan with chicken is on the stove
        achieve on(fryingpan, stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        boil_pasta(pasta, pot)

        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        bind fryingpan: item where:
            is_fryingpan(fryingpan)
        cook_chicken(chicken, fryingpan)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Cook the chicken and pasta together.', '2. Put the chicken pasta on a plate.']
